name: Run Run Rudolph
description:
Sport your ugly Christmas sweater, your festive cheer, and join us this week as we run our Reindeer Route!
After the run, stick around for a little bit (if you have time) for some hot chocolate.
PS: Now that the sun is setting early, make sure to wear your bright clothes, or sport a headlamp/other lights!
As always, we meet at the Sullivans Pond Gazebo at 6:30pm.
